_header: The moon in the morning merely rose

NLS1931.First Lines:
The mone in þe mornyng merely roseWhen þe sonne &
                    þe sevoun sterris softely were leyd…
NLS1931.Last Lines:
…for to mote of myche what more þen a lytullHow reynall
                    & robyn hod runnen at þe gleyve
NLS1931.Note:
Nineteenth-century transcript in London,  British Library Egerton 2257, ff.
                    169-?.
